scripts.all: npm run check && npm run tests

scripts.bump:reset: export MODULEVERSION=$(npm view ical-generator version | echo 0.0.0) && npm run bump:reset:save
scripts.bump:reset:next: export MODULEVERSION=$(npm view ical-generator@next version | echo 0.0.0) && npm run bump:reset:save
scripts.bump:develop: npm run bump:reset:next && npm --no-git-tag-version version pre${BUMP}
